original_text:
What is crooked cannot be straightened;
    what is lacking cannot be counted.
korean_text: 구부러진 것도 곧게 할 수 없고 모자란 것도 셀 수 없도다

sentences.original_text: What is crooked cannot be straightened
sentences.korean_translation: 비뚤어진 것은 곧게 할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: what is lacking cannot be counted
